sentences.sCn: 去苏格兰的长途公共汽车之行

sentences.sContent: The restaurant was full of coach parties (= groups of people travelling together on a coach ) .
sentences.sCn: 这家饭店里用餐的全是乘长途公共汽车的旅游团。

sentences.sContent: ...The coach had criticized him for not focusing on his soccer drills...
...a singing coach and a councilor to look after all her fifteen-year-old daughter's needs...

synos.tran: 教练；旅客车厢；[车辆]长途公车；四轮大马车

remMethod.val: “口吃” → 那个长途公共汽车的售票员有些口吃 → 长途公共汽车

trans.tranOther: a bus with comfortable seats used for long journeys
